message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $14,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns. However, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer.  Let's meet in the middle - how about $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,800. That's the highest I can go.
